description: JavaScript Developer Chroma are currently recruiting for a JavaScript Developer to join an exciting Digital Agency based in Sheffield. The team work on a hybrid basis with 3 days on site, 2 days at home. The team is built up of 3 senior developers, 2 mid-level and the technical director. If you have a passion for creating, a fresh perspective and a wealth of development and digital experience, this role is for you. You will be responsible for all aspects of development from the initial specific…
title: JavaScript Developer
